price: Onlar, Allah’a ve ahiret gününe inanır. İyiliği emreder, kötülüğü yasaklar, hayırlarda yarışırlar. İşte onlar da salihlerdendir.
arabic: يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَيُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wayusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wa-ulāika mina al-ṣāliḥīna
